events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorised under 'Engineering' based on their experience with software development and DevOps skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process and coordinate next steps.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call discussing their software development background and career goals.
The candidate responded promptly with availability for a technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the engineering role.
We have scheduled the technical interview with the candidate to assess their knowledge in software development and system design.
The technical interview concluded successfully with the candidate demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The human resources interview is scheduled to evaluate the candidate's cultural fit and discuss employment terms.
The candidate completed the HR interview, showing alignment with company values and clear understanding of the benefits package.
An official offer has been sent to the candidate including detailed compensation, benefits, and start date options.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and confirmed their interest in joining the engineering team.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to begin their new role as a software engineer.
Onboarding activities have begun for the new engineer, including system access setup and introductory meetings with the development team.
The hiring process is officially closed with the new software engineer fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering department.
